channel.title: rust on Melvin J Joseph
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Melvin J Joseph

item.title: Vinhal
item.description: Vinhal is a basic machine learning library built in Rust and exposed to Python using PyO3 and Maturin. It helps understand ML internals and achieves 50%-90% faster training times than native Python implementations. Built without external dependencies. Exposes safe Python bindings via Rust. Trains models super fast.
